review_details: Wow amazing food best in tisiliv in my opinion.the staff can’t do enough for you. Allways are 1st nights choice of restaurant and last night. I can’t recommend this place enough.

Great location only a short walk too beach and all the shops and bars. The three pools are clean and have plenty of beds around them.this hotel is no good if you struggle with steps.and the ques for the breakfast is a joke and too be honest the breakfast is very poor and not worth the wait

Wow what can I say loved are stay here would definitely recommend this hotel only down side is cardiac hill you have too walk up too the room.rooms were amazing and the staff couldn’t do enough for you
reviewFor: Ao Nang Phu Pi Maan Resort & Spa

review_details: Do not go too this show worst and longest hr of my life.would rather have root canal done without any pain relief .

Wow what can i say about this trip.just an amazing experience fishing the old traditional way.you leave zante harbour 7.30 am traveling out in the boat for a round 90 min then the anchor goes in and you then start putting the nets in this takes around 90 min .you then go too a lovely quiet beach for around 2 hr too snorkel or just have a few beers in the bar there.them you head back too the nets and bring them in which takes about 1hr .watching the nets coming in with fish we even had a octopus. Then it's food time all made with the fresh catch of the day.a few beers and wine too wash it down.then head back too zante harbour arriving around 4.00 pm .was a fantastic experience
Amazing food and the staff couldnt do enough for us .best food in greece.my 5 year old grandaughter wanted too eat there spag boll every night lol

wow what a gem of a place too eat.the food was amazing at a really good price .the staff couldn't help us enough when we was ordering .the atmosphere in the place was brilliant it's a little piece of Greece in Weston.i will definitely be going back there and advise anyone too try it I promise you won't be sorry.

Just got home from filial and loved every minute of it .Very clean had are towels and sheets changed every day.lovely family run hotel.especially Billy who runs the bar living in is box all day and all night. Will definitely be going back

would like too thank all the staff at the bull and dog for makeing my daughters bithday a really enjoyable experience. The food was excellent home made chips not the usual frozen rubbish u get in most pubs.we were served quickly and the young lady who waited on are table couldn't do enough for us. I will definitely be going back and would recommend it to everyone. Once again thanks

Can't recommend this place enough its the best place iv ever stopped at .the rooms are small and basic but clean.lovely size pool and the best bar in Greece paradise. The staff and the family that own it can't do enough for you and treat you like royalty. Iv been here 5 times now and have booked again for june and september this year .cant wait to see yannis and anna and there 4 beautiful kids again.and of course marios and tarzan .u can never leave
